Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.entity.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a game board that contains tiles. The board is initialized with a set of tiles, and each tile can be accessed by its ID.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Initializes a new Board instance with an empty set of tiles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Initializes a new Board instance with a given set of tiles.
    Tile
    getTile(int tileId)
    Retrieves a tile by its ID.
    Map<Integer,Tile>
    getTiles()
    Retrieves all tiles on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Initializes a new Board instance with an empty set of tiles.

  • Method Details

    • addTile

      public void addTile(Tile tile)
      Initializes a new Board instance with a given set of tiles.
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile that is added to the board.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int tileId)
      Retrieves a tile by its ID.
      Parameters:
      tileId - - the ID of the tile to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Tile object associated with the given ID.
      Throws:
      BoardNotInitializedException - if the board is not initialized or the tile ID is invalid.

    • getTiles

      public Map<Integer,Tile> getTiles()
      Retrieves all tiles on the board.
      Returns:
      a map of all tiles, where the key is the tile ID and the value is the Tile object.
